    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB ever))

      (ADVP
        (NP (DT a) (NN restaurant))
        (IN before)))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT that))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (ADJP (RB so) (JJ happy)
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN everything))
                  (PP (IN at)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ particular) (NN restaurant))))))
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (VBP tell)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP yourself))
                    (ADJP (`` ``) (JJ Ahh))
                    (SBAR
                      (X (SYM !!))
                      (S
                        (PP (IN From)
                          (NP (NN today) (NNS onwards)))
                        (NP (PRP I))
                        (VP (VBP am)
                          (VP (VBG going)
                            (S
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB come)
                                  (ADVP (RB here))
                                  (SBAR
                                    (WHADVP (WRB whenever))
                                    (S
                                      (NP (PRP I))
                                      (VP (VBP feel)
                                        (PP (IN like)
                                          (NP (NNP having)))))))))))))))))))))
    (: ...)))

pobj(at-10, restaurant-13)

  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NNS kids))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (ADVP (RB always))
        (VP (VBG hankering)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (NN pizza))))))

    (RB so)

      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP am)
        (ADVP (RB always))
        (VP (VBG looking)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (DT a) (JJ comfortable) (NN place)))

              (VP (VB bring)

                      (NP (PRP I))

    (. .)))

    (. .)))

            (ADVP (RB well))))

    (VP (VBZ tomatoes))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(tomatoes-2, fresh-1)
root(ROOT-0, tomatoes-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJ olive) (NN oil))
      (CC and)
      (NP (NN basil)))
    (VP (VBZ leaves))
    (. .)))


amod(oil-2, olive-1)
nsubj(leaves-5, oil-2)
cc(oil-2, and-3)
conj(oil-2, basil-4)
root(ROOT-0, leaves-5)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (JJ next) (NN time))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP visit))
          (, ,))))))


dep(time-4, So-1)
det(time-4, the-2)
amod(time-4, next-3)
root(ROOT-0, time-4)
nsubj(visit-6, I-5)
rcmod(time-4, visit-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (VP (VBG going)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (RB specially) (NN request))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (DT that)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(going-3, I-1)
aux(going-3, am-2)
root(ROOT-0, going-3)
prep(going-3, to-4)
advmod(request-6, specially-5)
pobj(to-4, request-6)
prep(request-6, for-7)
pobj(for-7, that-8)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (CD 4.25))
    (: \/)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (CD 5) (NN Conclusion))
        (NP (DT This)))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NN Pizza))
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (MD can)
                (VP (VB get)
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP
                      (QP (JJR less) (IN than) (CD $)))))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, 4.25-1)
punct(4.25-1, \/-2)
num(Conclusion-4, 5-3)
nsubj(Pizza-9, Conclusion-4)
dep(Conclusion-4, This-5)
cop(Pizza-9, is-6)
det(Pizza-9, the-7)
amod(Pizza-9, best-8)
dep(4.25-1, Pizza-9)
nsubj(get-12, you-10)
aux(get-12, can-11)
rcmod(Pizza-9, get-12)
prep(get-12, for-13)
mwe(than-15, less-14)
quantmod($-16, than-15)
pobj(for-13, $-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD 20))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Singapore))
          (CC and)
          (NP (PRP I)))))
    (ADVP (RB sure))
    (VP (VBP hope)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (MD will)
            (VP (VB put)
              (NP
                (NP (NN pressure))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (JJ other) (NN pizza) (NNS places))))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB start)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG reducing)
                        (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS prices))))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(hope-7, 20-1)
prep(20-1, in-2)
pobj(in-2, Singapore-3)
cc(Singapore-3, and-4)
conj(Singapore-3, I-5)
advmod(hope-7, sure-6)
root(ROOT-0, hope-7)
nsubj(put-10, it-8)
aux(put-10, will-9)
ccomp(hope-7, put-10)
dobj(put-10, pressure-11)
prep(pressure-11, for-12)
amod(places-15, other-13)
nn(places-15, pizza-14)
pobj(for-12, places-15)
aux(start-17, to-16)
xcomp(put-10, start-17)
xcomp(start-17, reducing-18)
poss(prices-20, their-19)
dobj(reducing-18, prices-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP La) (NNP Pizzaiola) (NNP 15\/3) (NNP Jalan) (NNP Riang) (NNP Singapore) (NNP 358987) (NNP 62825031) (CD 11.45))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (CD 2.30) (NN pm))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (CD 5.45))
    (VP (VBP pm)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (QP (CD 10.30) (CD pm))))
      (NP (JJ Closed) (NNS Mondays)))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (VP (VB Open)
    (NP (DT all) (NN day))
    (NP (NNP Sunday))))
